Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,575Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

entry.title: something about particle physics
entry.summary:
Author: wishingonalightningbolt

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,966Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 86

Summary: A universe in which mated pairs always climax together, so if your mate is jerking off you get to experience a spontaneous orgasm—even across vast distances. -0- At least when he fantasizes about his unknown mate, when he takes himself in hand and gets off on purpose, he can pretend they’re having sex. That’s part of the evolutionary purpose, people say—when you have sex with your mate, you guarantee a simultaneous orgasm, thus increasing the bond, the intimacy, the connection. So he can pretend that his mate is there in the room with him, warm, with a firm touch, a soft mouth. He can’t tell if the details he imagines sometimes are real or just something he’s invented in his head. Sometimes he wakes up just before his mate brings them both off and he swears he can see green eyes. Sometimes he’s indulging in his own pleasure when he sees glimpses of a five o’clock shadow behind his eyelids. He can picture details but not the whole image of a face: a strong, sculpted jaw, dark hair mussed over a forehead, part of a smile.

entry.title: The Scent of Love (Original)
entry.summary:
Author: Zero_Nemad

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,793Chapters: 13/16Kudos: 54

Summary: Sheriff Stilinski decides to sent Stiles on a months long overseas trip. Because his son definitely needs a vacation and a little time out from Beacon Hills.Thanks to Derek, who lives in Venice, Italy, he also has a place to stay.Reluctantly, Stiles agrees to fly to Europe and encounters a somewhat changed Derek Hale.As they share an apartment, they begin to redefine their uneasy friendship and learn to trust each other.With lots of fun and flirty banter, both guys eventually get to know a whole new world of heartbreak, sex and true connection.(note to previous readers: I've changed and added a lot of dialogues, rewrite the sex scenes and the ending of the story will be different than in the first version from 2022/23.)

entry.title: Momma Stiles to the Fucking Rescue you Bunch of FailWolfs
entry.summary:
Author: Estra4

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,944Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 828

Summary: Stiles needed a break from Scott and his Allison hat (get it because he has his head so far up her ass... you know what, never mind, I know I’m funny).After the absolute shit show that was the warehouses everything, Stiles was ready to sleep. Unfortunately, that sleep was being impeded by the infestation that was the Hale Pack. From would be runaways sneaking into his house at all hours to trauma bond, to a not so dead Creeperwolf, an angst ridden previous lizard person, and newly borne banshee in the body of pre-existing queen bee, not to mention the newly christened curly haired pup and the raging eyebrowed Alpha; it was a wonder Stiles would ever get a break for the rest of summer.Though an Alpha pack turning up at the same time as wolf twins was purely a coincident – Stiles is sure, and the less said about human sacrifices the safer for his sanity.Stiles is starting to think he jinked himself when he said nothing ever happened in this town. Too fucking much was happening and Stiles would like a refund, thank you, because clearly his stereotypical small town was broken.

entry.title: Ours, No Take-Backs Now
entry.summary:
Author: Death_Cap

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 67,227Chapters: 5/10Kudos: 19

Summary: Third in the What We Leave Behind, What We Carry Forward series.Derek and Stiles are already an established thing—bonded, messy, and very much in love. But now that Stiles is a werewolf, every touch, every fight, every promise burns hotter than he ever thought possible.Derek’s juggling therapy, building a pack, and trying to keep Stiles from self-destructing while the Kanima stalks the night and the Argents close in. Love, survival, and pack aren’t separate anymore.They’re the same fight.The thing about werewolves? They meant it literally when they came up with ‘no take-backs.’

entry.title: The Fox and the Wolves
entry.summary:
Author: Nathysama

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,352Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 64

Summary: In the coveted lands of Beacon Hills, a prized territory within Caeloria, magic is power—and its absence invites scorn. Stiles Stilinski, heir to an ancient house, bears the burden of being an inert: born without Arkanis, the magic that rules the realm. Ignored by his family and underestimated by enemies, he’s determined to protect the Stilinski legacy—even without the power others deem essential.With his grandfather leading amidst tense gatherings and his father missing under mysterious circumstances, Stiles is isolated and vulnerable. But the reclusive Hale family—feared for their near-feral strength—emerges as a potential ally. Together, wolves and foxes must face threats in the forests and the halls of nobility.Conspiracies and ancient magic place Beacon Hills at the center of a storm. Stiles must prove that even without Arkanis, a fox’s cunning can outmatch a kingdom of wolves.
